@Don Fairfield That's a good point. Why does anyone feel they need validation of their own beliefs through others, least of all comic book writers? Since when did our entertainers' views matter to us in the slightest? Why do we seek our jesters' approval of what we think? I can't, for the life of me, remember a single time where I felt the NEED for a movie star or a comedian or a game developer to agree with me about anything, least of all my political views. 

I only care about the product. Is the movie entertaining? Is the comedian funny? Is the game worth a damn?
